text: China national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of China. The team twice took part in the Summer Olympics, finishing in eighth place at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, California., and 5th place in the 2008 Summer Olympics. == Honors == * Asian Championship: Gold medal (1979, 1997, 1999) * Asian Games: Gold Medal (1986, 1990, 1998) * Asian Cup: Gold medal (2012) * Peace Cup: Gold medal (1990) == References == == Other websites == * CH Vollyball Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sports organizations of China
title: China men's national volleyball team
